source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT 
	T0.[CardCode], 
	Isnull(t0.CardFName, CardName) AS [CardName], 
	CASE 
		WHEN T0.[GroupCode] = 101 THEN 'Local'
		WHEN T0.[GroupCode] = 102 THEN 'Abroad'
	END AS [Group],
	T2.[CurrName], 
	T0.E_Mail,  
	'' AS [PayMethod], 
	U_ASLType, 
	t0.ListNum , 
	t0.LicTradNum, 
	DB_NAME() AS [DB_NAME]
 FROM [dbo].[OCRD] AS T0 
 
 LEFT JOIN [dbo].[OCRN] AS T2 
 ON T0.Currency = T2.CurrCode
 
 LEFT JOIN [dbo].[OCTG] AS T3 
 ON T0.GroupNum = T3.GroupNum

 WHERE [CardType] = 'S' 
   AND [frozenFor] = 'N'
   AND [GroupCode] IN (101,102)

SELECT 
	T0.[CardCode], 
	Isnull(t0.CardFName, CardName) AS [CardName], 
	CASE 
		WHEN T0.[GroupCode] = 101 THEN 'Local'
		WHEN T0.[GroupCode] = 102 THEN 'Abroad'
	END AS [Group],
	T2.[CurrName], 
	T0.E_Mail,  
	'' AS [PayMethod], 
	--U_ASLType, 
	t0.ListNum , 
	t0.LicTradNum, 
	DB_NAME() AS [DB_NAME]
 FROM [dbo].[OCRD] AS T0 
 
 LEFT JOIN [dbo].[OCRN] AS T2 
 ON T0.Currency = T2.CurrCode
 
 LEFT JOIN [dbo].[OCTG] AS T3 
 ON T0.GroupNum = T3.GroupNum

 WHERE [CardType] = 'S' 
   AND [frozenFor] = 'N'
   AND [GroupCode] IN (101,102)

source.sqlReaderQuery:
select 
PrjCode,      
PrjName,      
U_Owner       ,
U_OwnerMail,  
U_Secondary,  
U_SecMail     ,
U_PORFApp     ,
U_PorfApp2,
U_PORF

from oprj
where Locked='N' and active = 'Y'


select 
PrjCode,      
PrjName,      
U_Owner       ,
U_OwnerMail,
